ingredients.item: 400g can mixed bean salad, drained and rinsed

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a 20cm non-stick frying pan and fry the pepper and onions for 3-4 minutes. Add the pibil paste and beans and cook for 1 minute, season.

Pour in the eggs and gently cook for 4-5 minutes until nearly set, loosening the edges with a spatula occasionally. Place under a preheated grill for 3-4 minutes until golden and set, allow to cool slightly before removing from the pan.
Sprinkle with tortilla chips and serve with salad.
